desc: We are a small but professional app developer, currently preparing for the re-launch of our iOS crossword app „Clean Crosswords” ([url removed, login to view]) with Unity 2D.In order to minimize the time required by our very good Unity programmer to finish the product, we are looking for an efficient free-lance designer who is able to...•transfer and prepare all the graphics within Unity•create a few animations and transitions that meet the spirit of the material design style. We will deliver the source graphics including the mock-ups in UHD resolution and give a detailed briefing of how the animations and transitions should work.We will start with a test task that includes integration of the existing iOS graphics for the main menu within the Unity project, including different button states & the creation of short intro logo animation. A screenshot of the main menu is attached.If you think you are the right person then we look forward to your offer for the small test task.Requirements:•	You do have free time in the coming weeks to deliver•	NB: NO COMPANIES or AGENCIES -•	Only apply if you are based in Europe. We won't screen anyone from other locations!•	Must have experience with mobile apps and games.

title: adaalo india
desc: Hi,let me give you all the details regarding filter.there are 2 list in one page. one for all categories like brands, location, price range, experience etc.if user clicks on any item of 1st list, a 2nd list appears with check boxes for multiple selection.suppose user clicks on brands and choose say 3 brands out of 100 brands then he clicks on price range andchoose 2 price ranges say 1000-2000 and 5000-1000 etc.then my URL should append according to user selection with all respective numbers (which i asigned/ or coming from API) of his choice.NOTE: user can choose any category first then make his selections, then go for 2nd category and make his selection then again can come to1st category for modifying his selection.Example:if user clicks brand and make his selection then link should append like this:[url removed, login to view]  city_id  /?brandname=23^24^25(here 23, 24, 25 are the numbers for different brands)if user clicks on 2nd category(say color) after his choice of brand/brands then link should appear like this:[url removed, login to view]^24^25&pricerange=below50000^bet50000to200000&color=1^2here he chooses 2 colors also he chooses 2 price ranges here.if user again want to modify his filter for brand then again he can select brands in 1st category and improve his selection like:[url removed, login to view]^24^25^26^31&pricerange=below50000^bet50000to200000&color=1^2(26 and 31 are his new choices here).NOTE: 1. all data is coming from API, so for every category selection i'm calling API.2. if user choose 1st category then go for 2nd category and 3rd category then again come for 1st category, then his previous selections must be save there.==================================================================================================================================================================In social logins the issue that i'm facing is:I've social logins in total 3 pages. but they are working only in one page also they are not working in android 7.0 or above.ERROR: transectionTooLargeException.(Facebook, google and linkedin logins I'm using). you help me in this?Regards,Amit Saxena

title: Hire an iOS Developer
desc: Project JellyFIshEssential Project requirement:1. User Login• Allow user to sign up with Email and login app2. Personal information requirement• The app shall acquire user’s location.• App shall get user’s personal information, real-time location, age, languages (can be multiple) and gender when they sign up3. Voice chat match system• For every user, app provides voice chat match system that allows users to match with another user based on conditions (age, distance, languages, and gender.) they chose before match started• When users start the match system, they shall set up the age, distance, languages, and gender of people they want to chat with. Default languages shall be the same languages users chose when they signed up.• The system matches people and starts a voice chat for them for a certain time (x minutes). User shall be allowed to hang up whenever they want.• After the chat is over (x minutes or chat is ended by one user), the system shall ask users to choose whether they like or not the person they talk to.• Only if both users hit LIKE, they can be friends4. Friends System• App has FRIENDS LIST that shows all friends of the current user.• The app does not allow users to send picture and text message to their friends.App only allows user to send a voice message and start a voice call between friends.Feel Free to Ask us Question
